name: CollectSupplies
description:
Defeat the enemy and get to the top to collect your supplies!

Watch out for enemy attacks!

Operating instructions.

W: Forward

S: Back

A: Move left

D: Move right

R: Change magazine

Space: jump

Left mouse button: shoot

Mouse Rotate: Perspective change

PS:

If you find you can't jump, try pressing R to change the magazine and refresh it.
